entry.title: My first ever post
entry.content:
hello world!

Here I am writing my first blog entry. It feels exciting. There will definitely be more posts to come in the future.

To end here you have a beautiful formula:

\[e^{i \cdot \pi} = -1\]
entry.summary: this is just a short introduction
